ItemConsumable.name: meek
ItemConsumable.description: The vial of liquid is remarkably unthreatening. It's a biological refactoring agent that will render your biology better specialized to derive nutrition from non prey sources. The meek will inherit the urth.
ItemConsumable.effectmodifier: You can feel the substance seep into your every pore and coursing through you, rewriting your digestive and other processes. Your karma score is now VALUE
